alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haskell, Jones, northwestern Shackelford, southeastern Fisher and northern Throckmorton Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weinert to near Roby. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 45 to 50 mph and pea size to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Roby, Rule, Weinert, Irby, Sylvester, Noodle, Mccaulley, Paint Creek, Avoca, Longworth, Millers Creek Reservoir, Neinda, Sagerton, Lake Stamford Marina, Funston and Hitson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
